articles.title: Tausende demonstrieren in Russland gegen Ukraine-Invasion – mehr als 1700 Festnahmen
articles.image_title: Police officers detain a demonstrator during a protest against Russia's invasion of Ukraine in Moscow on February 24, 2022. - Russian President Vladimir Putin launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine on Thursday, killing dozens and triggering warnings from Western leaders of unprecedented sanctions. Russian air strikes hit military installations across the country and ground forces moved in from the north, south and east, forcing many Ukrainians flee their homes to the sounds of bombing. (Photo by Alexander NEMENOV / AFP)
